selectedVerses.text: And as her soul was departing (for she was dying), she called his name Ben-oni; but his father called him Benjamin.
By faith Jacob, when dying, blessed each of the sons of Joseph, bowing in worship over the head of his staff.
Thus Joash the king did not remember the kindness that Jehoiada, Zechariah's father, had shown him, but killed his son. And when he was dying, he said, "May the LORD see and avenge!"
as unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and behold, we live; as punished, and yet not killed;
for he had an only daughter, about twelve years of age, and she was dying.As Jesus went, the people pressed around him.
